item.title: 关于
item.description: 你好！👋 我是 Jacob，这里是我的个人博客。 正如博客的名字，我在这里记录我的想法、知识，分享我的发现。 纯文大学生，但热爱的是硬件与编程。 玩 Arduino
item.content:encoded:
你好！👋

我是 Jacob，这里是我的个人博客。

正如博客的名字，我在这里记录我的想法、知识，分享我的发现。

纯文大学生，但热爱的是硬件与编程。

玩 Arduino ，喜欢交互艺术，也搞点 IoT 。

喜欢猫猫🐱当然狗狗🐶也可以。

酷基，哈学博士🪄，低浓度二次元，听国际流行🎧。

偶尔玩点游戏的 PlayStation 玩家🎮。

交个朋友

Email (Base 64): amFjb2IucnVhbkBvdXRsb29rLmNvbQ==

WeChat (Base 64): aHR0cHM6Ly91LndlY2hhdC5jb20vTUFHQzNfdWQzN0J2bVdWX0lDT3hqeEE=

GitHub: https://github.com/Weixiang

关于本博客

本站采用 Hugo 驱动，主题为 PaperMod。

版权声明

本站文章除特别声明外，均由 Jacob Ruan 采用 知识共享署名-非商业性使用-相同方式共享 4.0 国际许可协议 进行许可。

English Version. (By Google Translate)

Hello.👋

My name is Jacob Ruan.

This is my personal blog. Just like the name of the blog, I am here to record my thoughts and share my knowledge.

I am a social science college student, My major in the college is marketing, but I don’t like it. I like art and programming, and my dream is to be a designer or engineer. For this dream, I am studying computer courses by myself. Wish me luck. 😀

Although I majored in social sciences at school, I also have a strong interest in natural sciences and computer science.

Thank you for your attention, but because of my heavy academic work, I may not update my blog very often. 😜

Years ago, I founded a STEM association in my senior middle school, called WAI STEM Club , it won some awards for my school.

Outside of my studies, I also enjoy programming, Arduino, international pop music and secondary culture. I’m also a fan of Harry Potter.

Copyright

Unless otherwise stated, the post of this website adopts the CC License.

This work by Jacob Ruan is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

Contact me

If you are interested in making new friends, You can find me in the following ways:

Email (Base 64): amFjb2IucnVhbkBvdXRsb29rLmNvbQ==

WeChat (Base 64): aHR0cHM6Ly91LndlY2hhdC5jb20vTUFHQzNfdWQzN0J2bVdWX0lDT3hqeEE=

GitHub: https://github.com/Weixiang
